text: Tusim pucho ki sabha tom vada gavaha kauna hai. Akho, alaha ki'unki uha mere ate tuhade vica gavaha hai ate mere upara iha kura'ana utari'a hai tam ki maim' tuhanu isa bare sucita kara denva ate uha vi sucita karana jinham kola iha kura'ana pahuce. Ki tusim isa gala di gavahi cide ho ki alaha de nala kujha hora vi pujanayoga hai. Akho, maim isa di gavahi nahim' cida. Akho, ki uha tam kevala ika hi pujanayoga hai ate maim' dausa mukata ham tuhade buta pujakam tom
